price: Nini faida ya kukumbuka kwao? Na alikwisha wafikia Mtume mwenye kubainisha.
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Watu hawa watawaidhika vipi, hata watimize hiyo Imani wanayo iahidi wakiondolewa adhabu, na hali Mtume mwenye ujumbe ulio wazi kesha wajia na miujiza yenye kuonyesha ukweli wake, na hayo ndiyo mawaidha makubwa kabisa?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
